segments.text: Good morning , I want to send this parcel to Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long would surface mail take , compared with airmail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , anything up to 3 or 4 months for surface mail . It depends on the sailing of the ships . Airmail would only take 1 to 2 weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much would this parcel cost me by airmail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just let me weigh it for you . That's 2 lb . and 6 oz . That's be Â£ 10 .
segments.speaker: S2
